title: RANKINGS IN ARAM
body:
To start off...yes I have posted something like this half a year or so ago and yeah, you can tell it didn't go well (nothing happened ...didn't even get a "NO" from riot staff). YES I AM a passionate supporter of ARAM and YES I AM greatly grateful for Riot's introduction of the snowball to the game mode.

What I am proposing:
- A ranking system in ARAM that is similar to that in normal (does not affect mmr or matchmaking)
- No changes to gameplay or the champion select screen to keep the simplicity of the game mode(no bans, still blind pick)
- End of season icons + loading screen border based on ranks (only visible in ARAM)

I'm sure this'll get ignore yet again but I still hope that it'll become a thing in LoL. 
Feel free to leave thoughts below and upvotes are greatly appreciated so that riot sees this :)

replies.body: The worst thing you can do with a random based game mode is make it competitive.
Pretty much this. Make this message staple to all future threads that want to make ARAM have a ranking system.
I thought everyone would say that :/
